name: Tortle
description: Tortles are turtle-like humanoids with a strong connection to nature and the sea. They are known for their wisdom, patience, and peaceful nature. Tortles are often wanderers, exploring the world with a calm demeanor and a desire to learn. They are sturdy and resilient, with a natural armor that protects them from harm. Tortles are often found near coastlines, living in harmony with the environment.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aquan.
special: Shell Defense: As an action, you can withdraw into your shell, gaining a +4 bonus to AC and advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in your shell, you are prone, your speed is 0, and you canâ€™t take reactions.
